name: @neynar/nodejs-sdk
description: SDK to interact with Neynar APIs (https://docs.neynar.com/)

scripts.generate:neynar-oas: rm -rf src/neynar-api/neynar-v1-api/openapi-tmp; openapi-generator-cli generate -i src/oas/src/v1/spec.yaml -g typescript-axios -o src/neynar-api/neynar-v1-api/openapi-tmp --config src/oas/openapi-generator-config.json
scripts.generate:neynar-oas-v2: rm -rf src/neynar-api/neynar-v2-api/openapi-tmp; openapi-generator-cli generate -i src/oas/src/v2/spec.yaml -g typescript-axios -o src/neynar-api/neynar-v2-api/openapi --config src/oas/openapi-generator-config.json

author: Neynar
